name: micro-frontend-golden-sample
description: Golden sample project demonstrating micro-frontend architecture using React + Webpack Module Federation + Material-UI

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "CONTAINER,USER-MGMT,DATA-GRID,ANALYTICS,SETTINGS" --prefix-colors "blue,green,red,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:container" "npm run dev:user-management" "npm run dev:data-grid" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:settings"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend/container && npm install && cd ../user-management-app && npm install && cd ../data-grid-app && npm install && cd ../analytics-app && npm install && cd ../settings-app && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd frontend/user-management-app && npm run build && cd ../data-grid-app && npm run build && cd ../analytics-app && npm run build && cd ../settings-app && npm run build && cd ../container && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd frontend/container && npm test && cd ../user-management-app && npm test && cd ../data-grid-app && npm test && cd ../analytics-app && npm test && cd ../settings-app && npm test

author: Micro-Frontend Team
